title: Honor / Punishment System Question
body:
Hello, I have a question about the current system of punishment / honor. How long; or HOW do you regain honor and make your punishment tier deminish? 
EX: just having a 10 game chat restriction. how long will it take to get honor 2 back and not have 25 game my next punishment?

replies.body: There isn't just a set amount of games you need to play, but rather you need to show consistent reform by not having any borderline or punishable actions on your account like in-game toxicity and such. Once you've shown consistent reform your honor rank will start to rise again.
